media:group.media:title: Understanding Heart's "Alone"
media:group.media:description:
Donate directly to the National Network of Abortions Funds: https://donate.abortionfunds.org/give/323375/#!/donation/checkout or find an abortion fund in your state: https://abortionfunds.org/funds/

There's a subtle art to taking a great song and making it your own, and while most of these discussions tend to focus on already well-known songs that were transformed, like All Along The Watchtower, we rarely think about the songs saved from obscurity by a cover. Alone is one of the best power ballads to come out of the 80s, but it almost went nowhere until Heart came along and showed the world just how great it really was.
